name: BouncyCake
description:
Help the sweet bouncy cupcake find an stable place in this world where platforms descend into oblivion, fight this unstable universe with the power of sweetness. To advance the levels you need to break all platforms. This is my submission for LudumDare made in the last minute ;)

Controls:

  WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement | ESC - return to menu

Assets :

  I used some online available assets and the music is Space Sailors - Grid
